attributes.action: Allow Donald Trump To Visit the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament must vote on whether the government can start the Brexit process, the Supreme Court has ruled.

LBC Radio has just said, someone should put another petition up. Due to the large number of callers supporting Trump.

It will be a good barometer to judge if Parliament should debate this and let the people of UK decide if Trump should come.
attributes.background: Trump secured victory over Democrats. Brexit also secured victory and their should be 2 petitions to allow for this to be debated clearly.
